metadata.title: USN-6059-1 -- Erlang vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Erlang did not properly implement TLS client certificate validation during the TLS handshake. A remote attacker could use this issue to bypass client authentication.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6059-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  erlang-x11 - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-jinterface - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-asn1 - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-inets - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-snmp - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-mode - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-odbc - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-common-test - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-examples - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-wx - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-ftp - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-observer - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-os-mon - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-syntax-tools - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-ssl - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-dev - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-ssh - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-megaco - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-manpages - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-tftp - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-runtime-tools - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-eunit - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-tools - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-debugger - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-parsetools - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-public-key - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-diameter - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-doc - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-reltool - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-xmerl - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-nox - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-eldap - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-src - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-edoc - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-mnesia - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-crypto - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-erl-docgen - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-base - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-et - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 erlang-dialyzer - 1:24.2.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
